title: Sound On: Biden-Xi, SCOTUS, Daylight Savings Debate
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden-Xi, SCOTUS, Daylight Savings Debate
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Hosts Jack Fitzpatrick and Emily Wilkins spoke with guests: Brian Klein, Founder of RidgePoint Global, Bloomberg Law Host June Grasso, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
